mapper.select: SELECT (@i :=@i + 1) AS id, commodity.`name`, commodity.price, commodity.image, commodity.`storage`, cart.`commodity_id`, cart.`commodity_quantity`, cart.`customer_id`, cart.`id` as cartID, specs.`specs_name` FROM commodity INNER JOIN cart ON cart.commodity_id = commodity.ID INNER JOIN specs_commodity ON specs_commodity.commodity_id = commodity.ID INNER JOIN specs ON specs.id = specs_commodity.specs_id, (SELECT @i := 0) AS it WHERE cart.customer_id = #{customerID} AND cart.isDelete = 0

select g.*,s.specs_name as specsText, c.commodity_quantity as goodCount FROM `cart` c JOIN ( SELECT g.*, si.img AS shopImg, si.NAME AS shopName, si.iD AS shopId FROM commodity g LEFT JOIN ( SELECT s.img, s.NAME, s.ID, sc.commodity_id FROM shop s LEFT JOIN shop_commodity sc ON s.ID = sc.shop_id ) si ON g.ID = si.commodity_id ) g ON c.commodity_id = g.ID LEFT JOIN specs s on c.specs = s.id where c.id in
#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE cart SET commodity_quantity = #{commodityQuantity} WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityID} AND customer_id = #{customerID}
UPDATE cart SET isDelete = 1 WHERE commodity_id = #{commodityID} AND commodity_quantity = #{commodityQuantity} AND customer_id = #{customerID}

update cart set cart.isDelete = 1 where cart.`id` in
#{item}
